76204.「……ぷるぷる。ここはね。\n エテーネって村だったらしいよ。\n<br>\n「:
...*jiggle* This is the place, huh. I heard it oozed to be a village called Ethene.
But long ago, its people defied a god who destroyed the village in anger. Scary, isn't it? *jiggle*...
That's why there's no one here anymore. But a little while ago, a beautiful woman and her grandfather passed by here.

76215.「……ぷるぷる。ここはね。\n エテーネって村だったらしいよ。\n<br>\n「:
...*jiggle* This is the place, huh. I heard it oozed to be a village called Ethene.
But long ago, its people defied a god who destroyed the village in anger. Scary, isn't it? *jiggle*...

78270.「……ふう。ひと休み ひと休み。\n<br>\n「あちこち 旅をしているけど こ:
...Phew. A rest. A rest.
I've traveled all over, but I never seen a place as strange as this village, I tell you. Did you know?

78271.「だよねー。こんな ヘンピな所に\n 村があるなんて 誰も思わないよね。:
I know, right? No one would think that there would
be a village in such a strange place.

78272.「知ってたの？ キミは 物知りなんだね。\n ふーん。エテーネって村だったのか。:
You knew? You know a lot of things, don't you?
Hmm. A village called Ethene? I wonder what kind of
people lived there.

78274.「北の空に浮かぶ 巨大な渦を\n お前さんは 見たじゃろうか？\n<br>\n「:
You saw that giant whirlpool in the northern sky, right? It's called the Creation Vortex.
I don't know the details, but you think it's been floating in the sky like that since before the world began.
